About

A little about me, I enjoy a little jazz, a lot of coffee, and then jamming away on my projects....ok, sometime it is dance music.

I am all about being cross functional. I want to understand the roles and responsibilities of my teamsmates so I make their lives easier and we can focus on building something awesome.

Why do I invest in the skills I do? Because I have a compulsion for everything I touch to be;

  • Aesethic
  • Functional
  • Planned and executed like a dang fine watch
This is why I devoure and train everything there is to know about design, development and planning and management...

Value Delivered

chat_bubble

Communication

I am proficient comfortable with general and technical communication with clients, stakeholders, project managers, designers, and engineers.

supervisor_account

Management

I like many others, have had projects affected by feature creep and loosely defined scope. From these experiences, I have a deep appreciation for diligent and rigorous product management. I make it a key focus to at the very least be aware of and apply a management paradigm to any projects I am involved in.

invert_colors

Design

I can not stress enough the importance of design in any project. It is omnipresent and is the lubrication by which the machine runs. In any role, I continue to develop, research and apply a design paradigm.

chevron_leftchevron_right

Development

While designing and managing various digital products. I found my deficit in understanding of the details of the development process was an opportunity to expand my knowledge of software production. To increase efficacy, over the past few months I have been developing my programming knowledge with a primary focus on web technologies.

Want to hear more about all the awesome stuff I can do for you? Let’s do coffee or an email.
Let's Chat email
